name: Micro App Dock
description:
Hey folks!

This is a sample prototype to use the smart animate feature. 

About the sample:
By using dock, you still able to show the shortcut of the micro-app. So the users able to access it effortlessly while scrolling to the bottom of the page.

Try the prototype here:
https://www.figma.com/proto/JbF1BZEjInlwfiDaWVmkv34Y/Micro-App-Dock?node-id=0%3A2&scaling=min-zoom
